product_name: Boulder Gear Chaos Jacket - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: When fresh powder calls your name, the Boulder Gear Chaos jacket is ready to keep you warm and dry no matter how long you stay on the slopes. Polyester shell features a waterproof, breathable coating for complete protection from wind, rain and snow; seams are fully sealed. Synthetic insulation offers exceptional warmth without bulk and continues to insulate even if wet. Detachable contoured hood provides an on-demand refuge from inclement weather. Internal, adjustable powder skirt helps seal out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable warmth. Internal wrist cuffs and a drawcord hem seal out the cold. Boulder Gear Chaos jacket features interior pockets for goggles, wallet and MP3 player, and external zippered chest and hand pockets. Special buy.
